settings.about_title: Bringing you the best audio gear
settings.about_description: Located at the heart of New York City, Audio Range is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audio Range the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.
